full_summary:
**Task and Solutions Professional Services Procurement Specialist – Level 3 (Senior)**
================================================็กชาย

###  Announcement Details

*   **Reference Number**: cb-109-48647010
*   **Solicitation Number**: 1000253989
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-09-26
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-10-10T14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date**: 2023-10-10

###  Profile Summary

Health Canada, Procurement, Materiel and Asset Management Division (PMAMD) has a requirement for one (1) Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Procurement Specialist - Level 3 (Senior).

###  Security Clearance and Set-Aside

This requirement is conditionally set-aside under the federal government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. The procurement specialist will require a Common Professional Services Security Requirement #6.

###  Contractual Period

The initial period of the contract is from the date of award to June 30, 2024, with two irrevocable option periods of six months each.

###  Project Details

Estimated level of effort: initial period up to 150 days, option period 1 up to 120 days, option period 2 up to 120 days.

###  Important Details

*   **Procurement Category**: SRV
*   **Notice Type**: RFP against Supply Arrangement
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
*   **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Contracting Entity**: Health Canada
*   **Contracting Entity Contact**: 
    Ahmad Omary
    (000) 000-0000
    ahmad.omary@hc-sc.gc.ca
*   **Notice URL**: Not available
*   **Attachments**: See (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20607/tsps-npp-%28english-1000253989.pdf)/ (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/20607/tsps-npp-%28french-1000253989.pdf)

Please note the tender is closed.
